DOC.brief_summary: To compare the number of passes required for cellblock acquisition with and without suction using the 25g needle.
DOC.criteria: All patients referred to UAB Endoscopy Unit for assessment of pancreatic mass lesions that requires FNA. Age < 19 years Unable to safely undergo EUS for any reason Coagulopathy (INR>1.6, Prothrombin Time>18 secs, Thrombocytopenia < 80,000 cells/ml) Unable to consent NonEnglish speaking patients
